definition: surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico
ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead

sentences.english: Add squids , Chng Kee's Light Soya Sauce and water, stir-fry and bring to boil .
sentences.chinese: 加墨鱼及庄记生抽王，略翻炒后，加水慢煮至滚。

sentences.english: Defrost cuttlefish ball and grill or barbecue till cooked and serve.
sentences.chinese: 烧烤解冻后墨鱼丸直到熟为止。

sentences.english: For toothpaste I use a mixture of cuttlefish bone and wild fennel seeds.
sentences.chinese: 牙膏我用墨鱼骨和野生茴香种子混合而成。

sentences.english: Squids and cuttlefish suck water into their bodies and then squirt it out.
sentences.chinese: 鱿鱼及墨鱼吸吮水变成他们的尸体，然后喷射出来。

sentences.english: The ink fish has eight legs. He doesn’t look like Sam.
sentences.chinese: 墨鱼有8条腿，看上去不像塞姆。

sentences.english: Clean and rinse cuttlefish , wipe dry; rub with ginger wine and set aside for a while.
sentences.chinese: 墨鱼清洗干净后抺干，用姜汁酒搽匀腌片刻。

sentences.english: Provision of a cuttlefish bone, which can be gnawed if desired, is also recommended.
sentences.chinese: 如果牠们愿意咬墨鱼骨，也建议给予牠们来增加钙质。

sentences.english: Give me one bite into your cuttlefish.
sentences.chinese: 让我咬一口你的墨鱼丸。

sentences.english: Tonight, and only tonight, the opalescent squid will mate.
sentences.chinese: 今晚，而且只有今晚，白色墨鱼将交配。

sentences.english: Remove cuttlefish when cooked, slice and serve with the sauce.
sentences.chinese: 墨鱼熟后，取出切件，淋上芡汁，趁热品尝。

sentences.english: Remove cuttlefish when cooled, slice and serve with the sauce.
sentences.chinese: 墨鱼熟后，取出切件，淋上芡汁，趁热品尝。

sentences.english: I have no idea about how to prepare those cuttlefish and lobsters.
sentences.chinese: 我对如何烹调那些墨鱼和龙虾毫无概念。

sentences.english: Similarly, the cuttlefish market is improving.
sentences.chinese: 同样，墨鱼的市场也在复苏。
